subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jerry Sloan is basketball’s solemn standard-bearer, embarking on his 19th consecutive season as coach of the Utah Jazz with the same uncompromising loyalty to fundamentals as when he began his career.
snippet: Jerry Sloan is basketball’s solemn standard-bearer, embarking on his 19th consecutive season as coach of the Utah Jazz with the same uncompromising loyalty to fundamentals as when he began his career.
